short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a sentry node and join the future of ubiquitous compute.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the future of ubiquitous compute, where access to compute is not a privilege for the few, but a fundamental resource available to all.

Gradient Network is the open layer for edge compute on Solana. Sentry Node sets the stage for the first phase of Gradient Networkâ€™s vision - Pervasive Connectivity. It helps map global connectivity and plays an important role in ensuring the liveness of computational resources. By design, it is privacy-preserving, lightweight ( <1MB data usage per month), and functional efficiently with intermittent liveness.

Get #GradientSentry now and be part of the journey!

Learn more about Gradient Network:
Website: https://gradient.network
X: https://x.com/Gradient_HQ
